scripts.start: printf '{ "version": "%s" }' `git rev-parse HEAD` > calyx_hash.json; WASM_PACK_PROFILE=dev parcel index.html
scripts.build: printf '{ "version": "%s" }' `git rev-parse HEAD` > calyx_hash.json; WASM_PACK_PROFILE=dev parcel build --public-url . index.html --log-level info; cp -R static/* dist/
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist rust/pkg; cd rust; cargo clean
